amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit credit card companies from raising annual percentage rates or introductory annual percentage rates except for reasons directly related to that credit card account or a late payment on another credit card or debt.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in the Congressional Record to insert provisions limiting the use of consumer reports.
